document.full_text: freshman brandon knight scored a career-high 30 points as kentucky defeated west virginia to become the first team to earn a spot in the sweet 16.
document.title: east: kentucky 71, west virginia 63: knight scores 30 in kentucky's victory over west virginia
lines_and_colors: freshman brandon knight scored a career-high 30 points as kentucky defeated west virginia to become the first team to earn a spot in the sweet 16.
